name: the doctors home
description:
this is a horror game where you are stuck in a doctors house try to find key and other items to escape  there will be  holiday updates also. also we would love if people would make videos on our game and comment them so we can watch . new update added cut scenes and puzzles fixed secrete door and added youtubers that play the game in credits  also made it harder to find key added a back yard and updated the front yard and a new way to defend your self from doctor.
